reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anthea and Brian were perfect hosts! The room was very comfortable with an amazing view. The breakfasts were the best on the South Island--fresh baked croissants, French Toast with carmelized bananas, fresh fruit from the garden--we couldn't ask for anything more. It rained during our stay, so we could not hike in Abel Tasman, but Anthea and Brian had great recommendations for touring in Nelson. Great stay!
reviews.title: Excellent B & B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This house is really beautiful with some amazing views but the hosts make it a wonder.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.text: The house is located on the hills of Kaiteriteri and you have spectacular views of the bay. The hosts welcomed us on the day of arrival with some afternoon tea accompanied by some homemade cakes and later they shared with us some wine and homemade nibbles. The room we had was beautifully decorated with fresh flowers full of very charming details like a plate with chocolates, a tray with fresh fruits and also some cookies. But the real difference is a personalised welcome note.
reviews.title: Fantastic B&B

reviews.text: The ensuite bathroom has a very nice shower, high quality amenities and thick soft bathing towels, many more than standard. Needless is to say that the whole place is spotless, from the windows to every single corner, there is nothing, absolutely nothing to find.
reviews.title: Excellent Bed & Breakfast

reviews.text: Brian and Anthea, the owners and hosts, are charming, warm and professional, they welcome you in such a manner that they make you feel at home. Anthea surprised us with a lunch pack for our hiking tour, grateful selection of wines in the afternoon, full support in any bookings or recommendations and a laundry service. She is like a mom and we really enjoyed it. Brian is very British with a great knowledge of the nature and the area. Both are so polite, friendly and great companions during our stay.
reviews.title: Best Bed and Breakfast ever
